clinical_study.brief_title: Changing the Vulnerable Brain: A Neuromodulation Study in Alcohol Dependence
clinical_study.official_title: Changing the Vulnerable Brain: A Neuromodulation Study in Alcohol Dependence

lead_sponsor.agency: Academisch Medisch Centrum - Universiteit van Amsterdam (AMC-UvA)

clinical_study.source: Academisch Medisch Centrum - Universiteit van Amsterdam (AMC-UvA)

brief_summary.textblock: This current project investigates the effect of a single session of right dlPFC repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation on emotion regulation abilities and craving in alcohol dependent patients and healthy controls.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in BOLD response during an emotion regulation task (fMRI)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change in BOLD response from baseline, compared to BOLD response after stimulation (approximately two weeks later)
primary_outcome.description: BOLD response was measured during an emotion regulation task. The change in BOLD response between sessions is the primary outcome for this study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in experienced emotion during an emotion regulation task with Visual Analogue Scales (VAS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change in experienced emotion from baseline, and after the stimulation session (approximately two weeks later)
secondary_outcome.description: Participants were instructed to either 'attend' or 'regulate' their emotion associated with the presented (negatively valenced) pictures. Experienced (or regulated) emotion was assessed with visual analogue scales (VAS).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in craving levels [Alcohol Urge Questionnaire (AUQ)]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and after the emotion regulation task, during both baseline and stimulation session (e.g. 4 time points, sessions were separated by approximately two weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: The AUQ was administered in order to assess craving levels. The AUQ consists of eight statements wich are rated on a 7 point likert scale [0 = Strongly disagree, 6 = Strongly Agree]

arm_group.description: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation: Active 10hz stimulation over the right dorsolateral Prefrontal Cortex (dlPFC)
Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation: sham stimulation over the right dlPFC

intervention.description: Repetitive 10Hz right DLPFC stimulation using Magstim TMS apparatus

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Alcohol Dependence
- Currently abstinent
Exclusion Criteria:
- psychoactive medication
- not eligible for MRI (metals or claustrophobia)
- (familial) history of epilepsy
- current psychiatric disorders (besides alcohol dependence)
